title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Limistéir Pleanála
text_raw:
1. Féadfar an tOrdú um Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 (Limistéir Pleanála 

Teanga Ghaeltachta a Ainmniú), (Uimh. 3), 2021 a ghairm den Ordú seo.
text_norm: 1 feadfar tordu um acht na gaeltachta 2012 (limisteir pleanala teanga ghaeltachta ainmniu) (uimh 3) 2021 ghairm den ordu seo

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. Tá an limistéar a shonraítear sa Sceideal ainmnithe mar Limistéar
text_raw:
2. Tá an limistéar a shonraítear sa Sceideal ainmnithe mar Limistéar 
Pleanála Teanga Ghaeltachta chun críocha alt 7(2) d’Acht na Gaeltachta, 2012 
(Uimh. 34 de 2012). 

Foilsíodh fógra san “Iris Oifigiúil” an 28 Nollaig, 2021, á rá go 
ndearnadh an Ionstraim Reachtúil seo. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [709] 3 

SCEIDEAL 

Limistéar Pleanála Teanga: Toraigh, Co. Dhún na nGall 

(1) An chuid sin de thoghroinn ceantair Mhín an Chladaigh i gContae Dhún 
na nGall atá comhdhéanta den bhaile fearainn seo a leanas: Toraigh. 

Arna thabhairt faoi mo láimh, 
 8 Nollaig 2021. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

 Aire Stáit ag an Roinn Tuarasóireachta, Cultúir, 
Ealaíon, Gaeltachta, Spóirt agus Meán. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [709] 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

STATUTORY INSTRUMENTS. 

S.I. No. 709 of 2021 

________________ 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT LANGUAGE 
PLANNING AREAS) (NO. 3) ORDER 2021 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [709] 5 

Official Translation / Tiontú Oifigiúil 

S.I. No. 709 of 2021 

GAELTACHT ACT 2012 (DESIGNATION OF GAELTACHT LANGUAGE 
PLANNING AREAS) (NO. 3) ORDER 2021 

I, JACK CHAMBERS, Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, 
Arts, Gaeltacht, Sport and Media, in exercise of the powers conferred on me by 
section 7(2) of the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (No. 34 of 2012) (as adapted by the 
Culture, Heritage and the Gaeltacht (Alteration of Name of Department and Title 
of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts, 
Gaeltacht, Sport and Media (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2020 
(S.I. No. 547 of 2020), hereby order as follows:

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Gaeltacht Act 2012 (Designation of 

Gaeltacht Language Planning Areas) (No. 3) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited gaeltacht act 2012 (designation gaeltacht language planning areas) (no 3) order 2021

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: 2. The area specified in the Schedule is designated to be a Gaeltacht
text_raw:
2. The area specified in the Schedule is designated to be a Gaeltacht 
Language Planning Area for the purposes of section 7(2) of the Gaeltacht Act 
2012 (No. 34 of 2012). 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 28th December, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [709]
text_norm: 2 area specified schedule designated gaeltacht language planning area purpose section 7(2) gaeltacht act 2012 (no 34 2012) notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 28th december 2021 6 709

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 403 of 2020)) and the Tourism, Culture, Arts,
heading: Language Planning Area: Toraigh, Co. Donegal
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Language Planning Area: Toraigh, Co. Donegal 

(1) That part of the electoral division area of Mhín an Chladaigh in County 

Donegal which consists of the following townland: Toraigh 

GIVEN under my hand, 
 8 December 2021 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

 Minister of State at the Department of Tourism, Culture, Arts, 

Gaeltacht, Sport and Media. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [709] 7
